column2: Remove file based storage from project creation options (fixes first part of IDEA-137327)

column3: As per ticket https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-137327, this removes the file based storage from new project creations.
Until IDEA-80673 is fixed it may be convenient to use file-based storage format if you have many small projects which project files aren't shared via VCS. So don't let's remove the option for now.
Remove file based storage from project creation options
